text: The name Marcia [ mahr-shuh ] is a female given name which comes from Latin. It means "dedicated to Mars". Marcia also means "proud, warlike, martial". It is a feminine form of Marcus. This is a unique name (not in the top 1000 newborn names in the US in 2021). People who have the name include entertainers Marcia Cross and Marcia Wallace. Fictional people include Marcia Brady from The Brady Bunch. == People == * Marcia Gay Harden, American actress * Marcia Wallace, American actress and comedian (1942-2013) * Marcia Strassman, American actress and singer (1948-2014) ==References== Category:Given names
title: Marcia
